profile.title: Profile
profile.summary: Software Engineer with over 6 years of experience in the technology sector, passionate about building intuitive and efficient user interfaces. Specialized for the last 3+ years in the Angular ecosystem, transforming complex requirements into robust and scalable web applications. Actively seeking a challenging role in an international environment. My previous experience with C++ and C# has provided me with a solid foundation in software engineering principles and optimization.

jobs.title: Frontend developer
jobs.description: Development and maintenance of user-centric web applications with Angular for the logistics sector, focusing on scalability and performance.
achievements: Architected a modular SCSS style library adopted in over 5 projects, reducing UI development time by 20%.
Engineered a complex drag-and-drop feature for a key logistics application.
Optimized application performance by strategically using browser local storage for client-side data persistence.

jobs.title: Software developer
jobs.description: Engineered and maintained critical backend solutions in C++ and developed desktop applications in C# to optimize internal business processes.
achievements: Built a data synchronization module in C++ to connect a legacy system with a modern SQL Server database.
Developed a C# desktop application for the finance department to manage accounting and comply with new tax regulations.

jobs.title: Web developer
jobs.description: Led a complete technical overhaul of the company's main web application, refactoring legacy PHP code to a modern stack (JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3) and significantly improving load times and user experience.
